name: Earth's Cultivators:  "The Wyrmwell" Art Exhibition

address.streetAddress: 399 The West Mall - Etobicoke Civic Centre

description:
Wyrmwell Studios showcases emerging Toronto artists Shevon Lewis, Kima Lenaghan, Amy Thomson, and Misbah Ahmed. Explore their illustrations, transformative portraiture, and sculptural ceramics.

Join the Artists for opening reception on Saturday November 1, 2 to 4 p.m. Light refreshments provided.

For more information, visit https://www.instagram.com/wyrmwell_studios/
